footer.description: Reliable strength of steel. Specialized in manufacturing steel structures and premium welding technologies.

hero.subtitle: STEELTECH ZEPCE
hero.description: Specialized in manufacturing steel structures and premium welding technologies. Solutions that meet the highest industrial standards.

about.p1: Steeltech Zepce combines knowledge, modern technology and passion for metal. We continuously invest in modern equipment and skilled staff, because we believe quality starts with people.
about.p2: Our work is fully compliant with ISO standards, guaranteeing safety, precision and durability of every project.

certificates.description: Our certificates guarantee compliance with the highest European standards for steel structure production and welding.

steelConstructions.title: Steel Structures
steelConstructions.description: Steel halls, warehouses, balconies, fences and staircases.

welding.title: Welding & Assembly
welding.description: MIG, MAG, TIG, SMAW and laser welding.

cta.title: Have a Project?
cta.description: Contact us for a free assessment and quote. Our team is ready to help you realize your project.

intro.p1: {company} is a young, family business that combines knowledge, modern technology and passion for metal.
intro.p2: We specialize in manufacturing steel structures and premium welding technologies, providing solutions that meet the highest industrial standards.
intro.p3: We continuously invest in modern equipment and skilled staff, because we believe quality starts with people. Our work is fully compliant with ISO standards, guaranteeing safety, precision and durability of every project.
intro.p4: Guided by a clear vision of development, Steeltech is constantly expanding and improving its capabilities, with the goal of becoming a reliable partner in steel structures - today, tomorrow and in the future.

isoStandards.title: ISO Standards
isoStandards.description: Our work is fully compliant with ISO standards, guaranteeing safety and precision.

modernEquipment.title: Modern Equipment
modernEquipment.description: We continuously invest in modern equipment and the latest welding technologies.

familyCompany.title: Family Business
familyCompany.description: A young family business that combines knowledge, technology and passion for metal.

references.title: References
references.description: We have achieved and proven our knowledge and quality by performing welding and assembly work for leading companies:

cta.title: Ready to Collaborate?
cta.description: Contact us for more information about our services and collaboration opportunities.

steelConstructions.title: Steel Structures
steelConstructions.description: We specialize in manufacturing turnkey steel halls, mezzanine warehouses, prefabricated balconies and fences, metal staircases, special cargo vehicles and other metal products according to customer requirements.

welding.title: Welding & Assembly Technology
welding.description: Technologies for which we have equipment and expertise are MIG, MAG, TIG, SMAW and LASER WELDING. We work on manufacturing equipment for substations, work machines and industrial plants.

laserCutting.title: Laser Cutting
laserCutting.description: Laser cutting and metal processing services including drilling and bending. We have a 6kW fiber laser, press brake up to 3m, and drilling capability up to 100mm diameter.

antiCorrosion.title: Anti-Corrosion Protection
antiCorrosion.description: Through our partners, we can offer hot-dip galvanizing, wet painting with nitro and polyurethane paints, and electrostatic powder coating services.

transport.title: Transport Services
transport.description: For all our products, we provide transportation to destination and crane services. Complete logistical support for your projects.

cta.title: Need a Quote?
cta.description: Contact us for a free assessment and quote for your project.

directions.title: Directions
directions.point1: We are located in Brankovici, municipality of Zepce
directions.point2: Easily accessible from the main M17 highway

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - SteelTech | Data Protection
privacy.description: SteelTech Privacy Policy - learn how we collect, use and protect your personal data in accordance with GDPR regulations.
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, GDPR, personal data, SteelTech

cookies.title: Cookies Policy - SteelTech | Cookie Usage
cookies.description: SteelTech Cookies Policy - information about the cookies we use on our website and how to manage them.

cookieConsent.title: We Use Cookies
cookieConsent.description: This website uses cookies to provide you with the best user experience. Some cookies are essential for the website to function, while others enhance your experience.

necessary.title: Essential Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They are used for basic features like security and accessibility.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality such as remembering your language preference.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: These cookies are set by third parties like Google Maps to display an interactive map of our location.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Metalna proizvodnja Steeltech Zepce (hereinafter: "we", "us" or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal data when you use our website steeltech.ba.

dataSubject.definition: A natural person whose personal data is being processed.

personalData.definition: Any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person.

processing.definition: Any operation or set of operations performed on personal data.

controller.definition: A natural or legal person who determines the purposes and means of processing personal data.

dataTypes.title: Types of Data We Collect
dataTypes.intro: We may collect the following types of personal data:

purpose.title: Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.intro: We use your personal data for the following purposes:

items.respond: Responding to your inquiries submitted through the contact form
items.improve: Improving the functionality of our website

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected. Data from the contact form is kept until your inquiry is processed and resolved, after which it is securely deleted. Technical data such as IP addresses is kept temporarily for security purposes.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights:

items.access: Right of access - you may request a copy of your personal data
items.rectification: Right to rectification - you may request correction of inaccurate data
items.erasure: Right to erasure - you may request deletion of your data

rights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the contact details provided below.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction. This includes the use of HTTPS encryption, CSRF protection for the contact form, and regular security updates.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve your user experience. For detailed information about the cookies we use and how to manage them, please see our

thirdParty.title: Links to Other Websites
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those external websites. We recommend that you review the privacy policies of each website you visit.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. We recommend that you periodically review this page to stay informed of any changes.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

what.title: What are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet or mobile) when you visit a website. They are used to remember your settings, improve user experience and analyze website usage.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.intro: We use the following types of cookies on our website:

necessary.title: Essential Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function. Without them, certain features would not work properly.

items.csrf: Protection against CSRF attacks on the contact form

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable additional functionality such as remembering your preferences.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: These cookies are set by third parties whose services we use on our website.

items.maps: Displays an interactive map of our location

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.content: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the button below.
manage.browserNote: You can also manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that blocking certain cookies may affect website functionality.

googleMaps.title: Google Maps
googleMaps.content: On our "Location" page, we use Google Maps to display our location. Google Maps may set its own cookies for the map to function properly. If you do not accept third-party cookies, the map will not be displayed, but you will still be able to access our address and get directions.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with a new update date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about our cookies policy, please contact us at:
